summary: Three guys from differents countries (Peru, Argentina and Chile) come together in a funny adventure through the jungle in order to get to the Final of the FIFA World Cup Brasil 2014.
cast: Carlos Alcántara|Pablo Granados|Felipe Izquierdo|Gaby Espino|Cristián de la Fuente|Mario Alarcón|Carlos Carlín|Marcela Guerty|Andrea Montenegro|Eduardo Ramos|Mariana Richaudeau|Rocío Rodríguez Presedo|Claudio Torres
title: Lusers, los amigos no se eligen
